<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mammoth Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3444) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443)

**Requirements**
You are riding your megafauna companion.

</column>

---

You [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) to order your megafauna companion to Stride twice. At any point during this movement, you can make a melee Strike against one enemy within reach.
